plot: A shy and naive robotic alien cat is sent to earth occasionally disguised as a foreign exchange student from Eastern Europe in order to study tween culture. Only Junior Lebore, the son of the household that adopted her knows her secret.
plot_en: A shy and naive robotic alien cat is sent to earth occasionally disguised as a foreign exchange student from Eastern Europe in order to study tween culture. Only Junior Lebore, the son of the household that adopted her knows her secret.
plot_es: A shy and naive robotic alien cat is sent to earth occasionally disguised as a foreign exchange student from Eastern Europe in order to study tween culture. Only Junior Lebore, the son of the household that adopted her knows her secret.
title: Katbot
